title: ARAM shopping bug
body:
Just played an ARAM as {{champion:3}} and when i died and respawned on the fountain i was unable to purchase items from the shop. i could buy items whilst waiting to respawn however not once i had spawned, this lasted all game. please not i had not moved from the fountain or even on it the buy button would just become unusable the momoent i spawned.

Update
played another ARAM as {{champion:38}} didn't have an issue shopping.

replies.body: If you can replicate the bug then it's worth posting it here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report with detailed steps on how to replicate. (Please read the guidelines in the bottom left panel before posting.
